template.description: A demo to show how to get NiFi Process Group authorized for astra connections.
template.name: Astra_GetAuthToken

labels.label: If you want to use Astra Secure Bundle: Copy the bundle to a nifi owned folder and unpack. Modify the astra_StandardSSLContextService with the path and passwords to the keystore and truststore. Route the flow to invokeHttp ASTRA on bottom as by default this template is using cacerts

REQUIREMENTS: Get the Process Group ID. Get your Astra Credentials Update Variables Confirm/Update Blue InvokeHttp with NiFi Host:Port Obtain path for java CACERTS Configure & Enable CACERTS SSL Context Service (password is changeit)

Variables Used:
astraApi: astraProcessGroupId: astraPassword: astraToken: astraUser:

outputPorts.name: error
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'error'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections

outputPorts.name: output1
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'output1'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections
